meaning_str.bing:
adj. 响亮的；大声的；洪亮的；高亢的
adv. 大声地；响亮地
网络. 高声的；吵闹的；娜喊

响亮的；大声的；洪亮的；高亢的

响亮的；喧闹的；显眼的；鲜艳的；炫耀的；俗艳的；花哨的；过分强调的；坚决的；强烈的；刺耳的
响亮地；大声地；吵闹地；喧哗地；高声地；震耳欲聋地

1.en: Then fell I down upon my face, and cried with a loud voice, and said, Ah Lord GOD! wilt thou make a full end of the remnant of Israel?
1.cn: 于是我俯伏在地，大声呼叫说，哎。主耶和华阿，你要将以色列剩下的人灭绝净尽吗。

2.en: I was even singing it out loud, which was a little embarrassing even though I was the only one there.
2.cn: 我甚至高声唱了起来，只有我一个人但还是让人有点尴尬，尽管她非常流行。

3.en: as it was approaching the house, suddenly some loud sound of firecrackers came out of the house.
3.cn: 当它快要接近屋子时，突然屋里传出一阵鞭炮声。

0.en: And based on living next to you for three years, involves loud and unnecessary appeals to a deity. Oh, God. Yes, exactly.
0.cn: 而且跟你做了三年邻居，听了太多不必要又响亮的呼唤神。天呐。对，就是这句。

1.en: Hello, everybody. Grampy Rabbit has a very loud voice. What have I got here? A rock. Yes. But not any old rock. I found it on the moon.
1.cn: 大家好。兔爷爷有一个很响亮的声音。我这有什么呢？一块石头。是的，但是不是什么寻常的石头。我在月球上找到的。

2.en: Okay, I said that out loud right?

3.en: I heard that. Well, I said it loud.
3.cn: 我听到了，我就是说给你听的。

4.en: Chandler had a mustache, for crying out loud.

5.en: Not so loud, but ideally, yes. Thanks. Thank you.
5.cn: 别那么大声，不过理论上是正确的。谢谢。谢谢你。

6.en: After the brothers went to sleep, I heard loud voices.
6.cn: 当他们几兄弟都睡着之后，我听到很吵的声音。

7.en: Well I don't like to say it out loud, but, yeah.
7.cn: 我没有说得这么明显，不过没错。

8.en: Thank you, Evan, but maybe we shouldn't say that out loud.
8.cn: 谢谢你，埃文，但我们不应该说那么大声吧。

9.en: My goodness. That was loud. Do it again. Emily is not shy anymore.
9.cn: 噢我的天啊！这才是最响的。再来一次吧。艾米丽现在没有那么害羞了。

10.en: Put on your noise canceling headphones, 'cause it's gonna get loud.
10.cn: 把你的降噪耳机戴上，这边会很吵的。

11.en: He's loud, he spills his drink on you, and he makes fun of your team.
11.cn: 他讲话很大声，饮料洒到你，他还嘲笑你支持的球队。

12.en: There's a loud banging noise coming from the roof. It is Father Christmas.
12.cn: 屋顶有很重的脚步声！是圣诞老人！

13.en: Mummy. The thunder bangs are very loud. It's okay, children; don't be frightened.
13.cn: 妈妈，雷声真的好响好响。没事的孩子们，你们不用害怕。

14.en: All that loud noise has sent baby Alexander to sleep. He's really fast asleep now.
14.cn: 啊，所有我们制造出来的噪音把宝宝亚历山大哄睡着了。他入睡的的速度可真快啊。

15.en: George. There's a loud banging noise coming from the roof. It is Father Christmas.
15.cn: 乔治！屋顶有很重的脚步声！是圣诞老人！

16.en: Vivian, too tall. Madge, big gums. Too loud, too smart, makes noise when she eats.
16.cn: “薇安，太高大”“玛姬，牙龈太大”“太大声”“太聪明”“吃东西发出声音”。

17.en: But, as long as I don't break it, Elmo did said: "Everything will be fine" out loud.
17.cn: 不过，只要我不打破它，工程后勤部大声说了：“毛事儿都没有”。

18.en: Because she thinks that you are blah and that you, Monica, are too loud. What? What?
18.cn: 因为她觉得你很哈啦，而莫妮卡你的嗓门太大。什么？什么？

19.en: Oh. I have. I have. I started making these little sock bunnies. Oh for crying out loud.
19.cn: 我有！我做了袜子兔，了不起吧。
